text: The Sartang (; ) is a river in the Republic of Sakha in Russia. It is the eastern, right source river of the Yana, and is long, with a drainage basin of .Сартанг — статья из Большой советской энциклопедии. Great Soviet Encyclopedia == Course == The river begins in the Verkhoyansk Range at an elevation of . From this area, the Sartang heads north along the Barylas, and continues north along the Yana Plateau between the Verkhoyansk Range to the west and the Chersky Range to the east. Around southwest of Verkhoyansk, the Sartang joins the river Dulgalakh to form the river Yana. The area around the Sartang consists of taiga. ==See also== *List of rivers of Russia ==References== Category:Rivers of the Sakha Republic
title: Sartang (river)
